723273f-a.title: Manhattan: South Street - Maiden Lane
723273f-a.text:
(1)
75 and 74-73 South Street (left), at and adjoining the S.4. corner 1
of aiden Lane. Also shown are Nos. 168 to 162 Maiden Lane (right), at, ]
adjoining and west of the S.W. corner of South Street. The 4-story cor- ]
Mner house bears Nos. 75 South Street, and No. 168 Maiden Lane. Note the ]
iron stairway leading to a projecting cabin-like entrnnce to the ''RestaurwI d
ant Espanol'. In the background (left to btght), are visible the Farmer's]
LLoan and Trust Co. Building, and the Bank of Manhattan Co. Building.
June 12, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A portion of the same, sho ing the lower stories only of No. 75.
Also shown (right background), is a part of the 7-story Building of the
New dersey 2inc Co., facing on Front Street, and bearing Nos. 156-160, as
well as Nos. 145-149 Maiden Lane.
October 13, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
A portion of No. 2, show ing prominently the iron stairway, and the
protruding cabin-like entrance to the ''Restaurant Espanol''.
October 13, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

723274f-b.title: Manhattan: South Street - Fletcher Street
723274f-b.text:
(1)
South Street, north from, but not including Fletcher Street, as
viewed from the 120 Wall Street Building, and showing a general view of
the area with the Rrooklyn Bridge projecting over the roof tops. Also
shown (right), are piers jutting into the East River.
October 3, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, showing a limited view of the area (from Maiden Lane to
Fulton Street onlyl. Also seen are piers 15, 16 and 17 East River.
This view is as seen from the 6O Wall Street Tower.
July 28, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

721559f-a.title: Manhattan: Maiden Lane - South Street
721559f-a.text:
Maiden Lane, south side, between South and Front St's.
The antiouated suilding bears No. 160. Adjoining this to
the left are two five story warehouses bearing No's. 162
and 164. S. Alexander occupy the structure bearing No.
154-58. This building forms an ell to front on Front St.
June 16, 1940
No's. 1-2
P. L. Sperr
NO RE RODUCTIONS
721559f-a.folder: Maiden Lane & South Street, Manhattan, NY
